results.title: Metformin use is associated with a reduced risk of acute appendicitis in Taiwanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus
results.text_hl: Table 2 shows the incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Appendicitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001064 @@@acute appendicitis@@@ and the hazard ratios by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure.
